short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the perfect font effortlessly with our Font Finder & Style Detector extension! Seamlessly integrated into your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Font Finder & Style Detector is a versatile Chrome extension designed to assist you in identifying and analyzing fonts and styles used on any web page. Whether you're a designer, developer, or simply curious about the fonts and styles utilized in a webpage, this extension provides powerful tools to explore and understand typography with ease.

Key Features:-
Font Identification: Quickly identify the fonts used on any webpage with a single click.
Style Analysis: Analyze various text styles, including color, size, weight, and more.
